name: POS Cart Transaction Simulator
description: Point of Sale cart simulator with real Salesforce Loyalty Management API integration using External Client Apps

SALESFORCE_CLIENT_ID.description: Salesforce External Client App Consumer Key (from Connected App setup)

SALESFORCE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Salesforce External Client App Consumer Secret (from Connected App setup)

SALESFORCE_USERNAME.description: Salesforce API User Username (dedicated user with Loyalty Management permissions)

SALESFORCE_SECURITY_TOKEN.description: Salesforce API User Security Token (concatenated with password for External Client App)

SALESFORCE_INSTANCE_URL.description: Salesforce Login URL (use https://login.salesforce.com for production or https://test.salesforce.com for sandbox)

SALESFORCE_API_VERSION.description: Salesforce API version to use (v58.0 or higher recommended for Loyalty Management)

SALESFORCE_LOYALTY_PROGRAM_ID.description: Salesforce Loyalty Program ID (18-character ID starting with '0ly')

SALESFORCE_ORG_ID.description: Salesforce Organization ID (18-character ID starting with '00D')

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'POS Simulator deployed! Configure your Salesforce External Client App credentials in the Heroku dashboard.'
